data.feedback: Excellent architecture plan with verified file paths, pattern consistency, and comprehensive technical guidance. Minor issues (implicit story dependency, missing backend files) are non-blocking.

issues.description: Story 2 has implicit dependency on Story 1 (reads files Story 1 creates)
issues.recommendation: Add explicit dependency or remove from filesToRead

issues.description: Backend reference files not in workspace

suggestions: Consider adding hourly_chart.dart, stats_summary.dart, activity_timeline.dart to Story 7 scope as mentioned in original epic filesToCreate
